graph_viewer module

Bases: object

disable_customisation()[source]

Remove the permission to the user to interact with the customisation options.

enable_customisation()[source]

Give the permission to the user to interact with the customisation options.

get_color_by_feature()[source]

Get the feature chosen by the user to correctly color the nodes.

Returns:

Selected feature modifying the ‘None’ string to None keyword.

load_graph_features()[source]

Fill the option menu with the graph features in order to color the nodes by features.

load_gxl_dir(new_dir)[source]

Load the gxl files on the listbox.

Parameters:

new_dir: directory where the gxl files are.

onselect(*args)[source]

Draw the image with the graph on the canvas

save_all(*args)[source]

Save all images in a directory chosen by the user.

save_img(*arg)[source]

Save the current image in a directory chosen by the user.

search_img_filepath(gxl_filename)[source]

Find the image corresponding to the gxl file given in input.

Parameters:

gxl_filename: name of the gxl file.

Returns:

Path to the corresponding image if exists, otherwise None.

select_gxl_dir(*args)[source]

Ask the user for the directory where the gxl files are.

select_img_dir(*args)[source]

Ask the user for the directory where the images are.

set_components_customizers(factory: gui.tk_factory.TkFactory)[source]

Set the values of the dictionaries components and customizers.

Parameters:

factory: TkFactory holding two dictionaries, one for the name and the corresponding tkinter widgets and the other one for the name and a corresponding boolean value if the component is a customizer or not.

update_es_color(*args)[source]

Update the color of the edges.

update_es_thickness(*args)[source]

Update the thickness of the edges.

update_es_view(*args)[source]

Update edge style view (color + thickness).

update_gxl_listbox(pattern)[source]

Update the list of gxl files such that it only display files that start with a given pattern.

Parameters:

pattern: string given by the user.

update_ns_color(*args)[source]

Update the color of the nodes.

update_ns_radius(*args)[source]

Update the radius of the nodes.

update_ns_view(*args)[source]
